title: Signing in to League
body:
I just got a new Windows computer and I downloaded League, but whenever I try to sign in to my account the message says, 
"Invalid username/password combination. Please try again." Even if I type it in correctly. I looked around on other boards, and tried to turn on the Peer to Peer setting and that didn't work as well.

Please help,
Thanks

replies.body:
That's strange. Can you log in from any other computer? If not, it sounds like your account may be compromised and you may want to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you in recovering it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I can log in from my Mac just fine, just that it won't allow me to sign in on the new Windows computer.
Gotcha. Can you confirm you've selected the correct Language/Region at the bottom right of the login screen before entering your credentials in and hit the login button?
Yes, that was the problem, thanks a lot !!!!!!
